name: musicxml-mscx
description: MuseScore to MusicXML converter and back.
author: Karim Ratib <karim.ratib@gmail.com> (https://github.com/infojunkie)

scripts.build:sef: for xsl in src/*.xsl; do sef=$(basename "$xsl"); xslt3 -relocate:off -xsl:$xsl -export:build/${sef/.xsl/.sef.json} -nogo:1 -t -ns:##html5; done
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:spec
